content: The change we, as business professionals will experience as we move from tapping on a mouse, keyboard or screen as our human interface device(s), navigating through archaic file structures and antiquated GUI, to naturally speaking to our enterprise grade virtual assistant (that’s always with us and gets smarter the more we interact with it via deep learning/neural net’s) appears to be the most disruptive and profound part of the mobile revolution for the enterprise. The timing of this culmination (of chat, AI and NLP) and venture couldn’t be better – congrats, Mark!
